Quotes: Don't cry because it's over, smile because it happened
Author: Dr. Seuss

Quotes: Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don't matter, and those who matter don't mind.
Author: Bernard M. Baruch

Quotes: Remember, remember, this is now, and now, and now. Live it, feel it, cling to it. I want to become acutely aware of all I’ve taken for granted
Author: Sylvia Plath

Quotes: Your visions will become clear only when you can look into your own heart. Who looks outside, dreams; who looks inside, awakes.
Author: Carl Gustav Jung

Quotes: My only advice is to stay aware, listen carefully, and yell for help if you need it
Author: Judy Blume

Quotes: To say "I love you" one must know first how to say the "I".
Author: Ayn Rand, The Fountainhead

Quotes: Everything that irritates us about others can lead us to an understanding of ourselves.
Author: Carl Gustav Jung

Quotes: When you're different, sometimes you don't see the millions of people who accept you for what you are. All you notice is the person who doesn't
Author: Jodi Picoult

Quotes: Until you make the unconscious conscious, it will direct your life and you will call it fate
Author: Carl Gustav Jung

Quotes: you can't get away from yourself by moving from one place to another
Author: Ernest Hemingway

Quotes: Strong people have a strong sense of self-worth and self-awareness; they don’t need the approval of others
Author: Roy T. Bennett

Quotes: When you mess up, ’fess up, stand up, and clean it up
Author: Tasha Eurich

Quotes: Your treasure--your perfection--is within you already. But to claim it, you must leave the buy commotion of the mind and abandon the desires of the ego and enter into the silence of the heart
Author: Elizabeth Gilbert

Quotes: If you want to conquer the anxiety of life, live in the moment, live in the breath
Author: Amit Ray

Quotes: I do not believe in taking the right decision, I take a decision and make it right
Author: Muhammad Ali Jinnah
